post.author: ajm113
post.body:
Well I got the game today and beaten it! Some of the places kinda got me lost like how did I end up their and it looked like a mixture of F.E.A.R/ Half Life2. I did like it when they kept it simple with the weirdo and drug attics, but it seems like since they added Fire Arms too the A.I more thats when I got that feel I was playing F.E.A.R. At the end of the level I guest I was going. "What???????" They where creative on the first game now it doesn't make sense at the end and it feels like Half Life 2!

I love the new multiplayer mode! I played a couple of rounds here is what I suggest!

1.Add a freaking skin color to the player models so I know who's on who's side? Or maybe a floating name of the user name's tag with team color? So people aren't running around like idiots trying too attack each other?

2.More player models! Atleast add more from the game story's characters!

3. Maybe a health that goes back to 100% after a minute wouldn't be a bad idea. A fire arm would be kick ass if it would only respawn after 5 min. Like a power up.

Out of all that the game was very fun. It would be worth a good dollar too buy.

If anyone needs any help with the game playing single player mode be sure to ask here or write a review of the game yourself. I will be happy too help out with any single player levels that you mite need help finishing or someone else on here will do it.

Sorry for any errors for right now. I need too sleep and warm up left over pizza!
